lead_paragraph: DIED, yesterday, on board the U. S. receiving ship Ohio, at the Charlestown Navy Yard, of disease of the heart, (being ill but fifteen or twenty minutes) George Ellison, boatswain's mate, aged 63. Ellison was a boatswain's mate in Commodore Perry's ship on Lake Erie, and pulled an oar in the boat which carried commodore Perry from the Lawrence to the Niagara.
